translation.en: was me.
You probably don't remember this, but...

translation.en: I put this in the time capsule because it's our friendship bracelet.

translation.en: You know, you're way off about Peter.

He tells me that himself.
And the reason that I call him is not to hurt you.

translation.en: Just...
My parents are splitting up right now,
and it's just really confusing.
Peter's been through it, you know?
I hid this over there because

translation.en: It's called jung.
It's the connection between two people that can't be severed.
translation.fr: C'est le lien entre deux personnesqu'on ne peut pas briser.

translation.en: Even when love turns to hate,
translation.fr: Même si l'amour se change en haine,

translation.en: you will always have tenderness in your heart for them.
translation.fr: tu auras toujoursde la tendresse pour eux.

translation.en: Gen and I have jung.
Part of us will always be tied to one another.

translation.en: If I want to move forward,
I have to stop blaming Peter for having it with her, too.

translation.en: Oh, there you are. Come in, sweetie.
You look amazing.
And you look like a girl not ready for the ball.

It'd be weird if I dressed up.
Ah. Oh, well...
I guess you won't be needing this, then.

translation.en: Sort of a shame that you don't want to dress up.

translation.en: Gosh, this would just...
look so lovely on you.
But, there you go.
Give me the dress.
How do I look?
The way you look
should be against the law.
translation.fr: devrait être interdite par la loi.

translation.en: You look great.
-I'm glad I decided to dress up. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: Je suis ravie de m'être habillée.

translation.en: Me too.
-It's my dad's. Yeah. -Oh, great.
translation.fr: - C'est à mon père. Ouais.- Super.

translation.en: -[giggling] -Shall we?
"It's my dad's"?
Come out from behind that table and come and enjoy yourselves.
translation.fr: Sortez de derrière la tableet venez vous amuser.

translation.en: These people are perfectly capable of serving their own punch.

translation.en: We're supposed to be working.
Convince her, would you?
Come on, ask her to dance.
What are you waiting for?
It seems as though they want us to dance.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'ils veulent qu'on danse.

translation.en: As volunteers, I think we should give the people what they want.
translation.fr: En tant que bénévoles, on devrait donneraux gens ce qu'ils veulent.

translation.en: -We're finally dancing. -Mm-hmm.
I... wanted to ask you to the sixth grade dance.
translation.fr: Je voulais t'inviter au bal de sixième.

translation.en: I actually went to your house.
I gathered up a whole bunch of sticks,
and I arranged them in the letters D-A-N-C-E,
translation.fr: puis je les ai arrangés en lettres BAL,

translation.en: with a little question mark at the end. Yeah. Right outside your window.
translation.fr: avec un point d'interrogation.Juste devant ta fenêtre.

translation.en: And then your dad came home.
I'm pretty sure he--
Yeah, I'm pretty sure he thought that I was
cleaning people's yards.
So he gave me ten bucks,
and I just, I got super nervous.
translation.fr: et je suis devenu super stressé.

translation.en: So I went home.
I can't believe that.
It's actually-- It's kind of embarrassing now.
translation.fr: En fait, c'est un peu gênant.

translation.en: I probably shouldn't have even told you that, I--
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas dû te le dire.

translation.en: I know you're with Kavinsky.

translation.en: Him and I are...
Are you okay?
Let's get some air.
Come on.
God, I can't believe it's snowing this late in the year.

translation.en: I mean, it'll...
probably melt by morning.
But-- [gasps]
-You know where this is going, right? -No! No, no, no. No!
translation.fr: - Tu sais où ça mène, non ?- Non !

translation.en: What are you doing?
[John Ambrose] Snow angels.
Are you cold?
-Yeah, I'm freezing. -Okay.
Come on.
It's Peter.
I'm sorry.
Are you all right, honey?
We kissed.
But, I...
I wanted him to be someone else.
translation.fr: Je voulais qu'il soit quelqu'un d'autre.

translation.en: And now I feel like I ruined everything.
No, no. You're too hard on yourself.
translation.fr: Tu es trop dure avec toi-même.

translation.en: Sometimes you have to kiss the wrong man
translation.fr: Il faut parfois embrasser le mauvais

translation.en: to know what's right.

translation.en: I have.
More times than a lady should admit.
But what if it's too late? I mean, Peter and I, we broke up.
translation.fr: Et s'il est trop tard ?Peter et moi avons rompu.

translation.en: So what? Unbreak it.
If that's what you want.
translation.fr: Si c'est ce que tu veux.

translation.en: And if he doesn't?
If he doesn't what?
Want me.
Well...
that will hurt like hell.
translation.fr: ça fera un mal de chien.

translation.en: Okay. Uh, Stormy?
Can I bring you back your dress tomorrow?
translation.fr: Je peux vous ramener la robe demain ?

translation.en: Because it's yours.
I have... I have to go.
Go.
You said you didn't like driving in the snow, right?
translation.fr: Tu disais que tu n'aimais pasconduire sous la neige.

translation.en: Break my heart, Covey.
Break my heart into a thousand pieces.
translation.fr: Brise-moi le cœur en mille morceaux.

translation.en: Do whatever you want.
I love you.
I love you, too.
[Lara Jean] When you light a lantern and send it into the sky,
translation.fr: Quand on allume une lanterneet qu'on l'envoie dans le ciel,

translation.en: you're supposed to make a wish.
translation.fr: on est censé faire un vœu.

translation.en: I thought I wanted a promise that Peter and I would never hurt each other.
translation.fr: Je voulais promettre que Peter et moine nous ferions jamais de mal.

translation.en: I wanted something that doesn't exist.
translation.fr: Je voulais quelque chose qui n'existe pas.

translation.en: I wanted happily ever after.
translation.fr: Je voulais un conte de fées.

translation.en: But I know now that I don't want a love in half measures.
translation.fr: Mais je sais que je ne veux pas d'amouren demi-mesure.

translation.en: I want it all.
And to have it all, we have to risk it all.
translation.fr: Et pour tout avoir, on doit tout risquer.

translation.en: If I could do it over, I wouldn't change a thing.
translation.fr: Si je pouvais recommencer,je ne changerais rien.

translation.en: Because everything that's happened has brought us here.
translation.fr: Parce que tout ce qui s'est passénous a amenés ici.

translation.en: This is our story.
And we're still at the beginning.
translation.fr: Et on n'en est qu'au début.

translation.en: ♪ I'm better by myself ♪ ♪ By myself, better by myself ♪
